entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 4 April 2023
